Text: Hi tr108, is it possible for you to upload the Lord of the Rings special edition box set stuff with all the extras? Tough call, I know, but trying my luck! Thanks. Love your quality uploads.

I meant the extended edition. 
Also, why is there no pink skull next to your name? You're one of the best uploaders this side of the solar system!
I will do the LOTR:Extended films with commentaries -- closer to the release of The Hobbit, Part 1 -- but no other special features.
TR108,do you can upload series "Oban star racers"?

Seriously! I just made an account to say thanks! This is by far the greatest copies of this show that I've seen online! Thanks. I would humbley ask that you please consider releasing Super Hero Squad, Iron Man Armored Adventures, and last but not least a proper Avengers Earth's Mightiest Heroes season release. There simply isn't anyone out there that can touch your stuff as far as animation is concerned. Keep up the great work!
WOW! Great upload! Made an account JUST to say thanks!!!
Could you please consider making Iron Man Armored Adventures, Avengers Earth's Mightiest Heroes, and Super Hero Squad season releases. Nobody can touch your animation quality! Thanks again!
